WorkItem.Description: My disc priest is getting very high values for T7 chest pieces on the upgrade list.   They end up being much higher than even UIduar hard mode gear (Character file attached).
WorkItem.Summary: [HealPriest] T7 Items getting high upgrade marks

Comments.Message: I think I may have fixed this when I stopped assuming Prayer of Mending will automatically jump max amount of times (This being that 2 part T7 was being rated higher than expected.) Should be fixed for next release.
Ah, ok -- that makes sense.  I find that in practice, I don't get very good PoM jumping since we almost always have a ghoul soaking them up so that would definitely overrate it for my purposes.
Just downloaded 2.2.2 and the problem seems to have gone away, so it looks like it's fixed now -- thanks!
